title: My Son’s a Queer (But What Can You Do?)
description: Celebrate Pride Month with My Son’s a Queer (But What Can You Do?) Grab those you love and experience the magic of Rob Madge’s hilarious celebration of identity, creativity, and the profound bond between parents and their child. Through a treasure trove of home videos and theatrical magic, My Son’s a Queer brings those moments to life, celebrating the power of childhood imagination, and the profound impact of parents who simply say “yes.”
